document_data.mainbody:
Cyric the Duck Sun was a comedic play performed in the city of Zhentil Keep during the late 14 century DR.
The play was performed at the Riverbank Theater following the destruction of the city in the . It depicted Cyric as a sinister waterfowl attempting to take control of a pond. The play was extremely popular with the populace of Zhentil Keep, whose faith in the Dark Sun was greatly diminished following the razing of the city. Cyrics clergy were outraged but could do little given their minority.
